mapper.insert: insert into solution_config (name, intro, web_config, creator, version, module, gmt_create) values (#{name}, #{intro}, #{webConfig}, #{creator}, #{version}, #{module}, now())
mapper.update: update solution_config set name = #{name}, intro = #{intro}, web_config = #{webConfig}, creator = #{creator}, version = #{version}, module = #{module} where id = #{id}
